meta.title: Sample SOP: Morning Coffee Routine
meta.goal: To prepare a perfect cup of coffee to start the day.
meta.purpose: A standardized procedure for consistent coffee quality.

nodes.label: Grind Coffee Beans
nodes.intent: Grind fresh coffee beans to a medium-fine consistency.

nodes.label: Choose Brew Method
nodes.intent: Decide on the brewing method (e.g., Pour Over, AeroPress).

nodes.label: Prepare Pour Over
nodes.intent: Set up the pour over cone, filter, and mug.

nodes.label: Prepare AeroPress
nodes.intent: Set up the AeroPress with filter and coffee grounds.

nodes.label: Brew Coffee Iteratively
nodes.intent: Pour hot water over grounds in stages, allowing for bloom and even extraction.

clarification_requests.question: What if I only have pre-ground coffee?
clarification_requests.answer: Proceed with pre-ground, but adjust expectations for freshness.

clarification_requests.question: Is a gooseneck kettle mandatory for pour over?
